revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Aqua Hideout |image = [[File:Aqua Hideout.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Aqua Hideout. |tokens = 30,000 |location = North of Route 124 }} '''Aqua Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 490,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=7|<center>N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt ||[[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt ||[[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}
